cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

project(iiot-gateway)

# Define some variables
set(PROJECT_PATH "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/../iiot-gateway")

# Place your code here

include_directories(
    .
    ./idk
    ./include
    ./src/transducer-templates/include
    ./src/transducer-transports/include
    ./things2pack/include
    ./things2pack/liquid-milk/include
    ./things2pack/liquid-oil/include
    ./things2pack/recorder/include

    ./idk/iHubble/poco-1.7.5/raspberry-pi-2/include

    ./idk/iHubble/libmodbus-3.1.4/raspberry-pi-2/include/modbus
    ./idk/iHubble/gsl-2.2/raspberry-pi-2/include
    ./things2pack/analytics/include
    ./opc/include
    ./opc/packml/include
    ./erp/include
    ./oam/include
    .

)


# Compiler options
add_definitions(-std=c++11)
add_definitions(-g)
add_definitions(-O0)
add_definitions(-Wall)
add_definitions(
    -DIDK_PLATFORM_ARM_RPI
    -DIDK_PLATFORM_FAMILY_THINGS2PACK
)


# Linker options


if(WIN32)
    # Resource options
endif(WIN32)

# Library path
set(CMAKE_LDFLAGS "${CMAKE_LDFLAGS} -L. -L./idk-libs/raspberry-pi-2/lib ")

# Define the CXX sources

set_source_files_properties(
    ${CXX_SRCS} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS
    " -std=c++11 -g -O0 -Wall")

if(WIN32)
    enable_language(RC)
    set(CMAKE_RC_COMPILE_OBJECT
        "<CMAKE_RC_COMPILER> ${RC_OPTIONS} -O coff -i <SOURCE> -o <OBJECT>")
endif(WIN32)



#{{{{ User Code 2
# Place your code here
#}}}}

add_executable(iiot-gateway ${RC_SRCS} ${CXX_SRCS} ${C_SRCS})
target_link_libraries(iiot-gateway ${LINK_OPTIONS})

target_link_libraries(iiot-gateway
    /home/pi/4.0-picominer/thing2pack-gw/iiot-gateway/idk-libs/raspberry-pi-2/lib/libcurl.a
